## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                              | Type                                                                                | Default           |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | [optional] Sets size of inside elements. | `ListSize.large \| ListSize.medium \| ListSize.small \| typeof ListSize["x-large"]` | `ListSize.medium` |
